query.name: findByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM STUDY_EVENT WHERE STUDY_EVENT_ID = ?

query.name: findAllByDefinition
query.sql: SELECT * FROM STUDY_EVENT WHERE STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID = ?

query.name: findAllWithSubjectLabelByDefinition
query.sql: select se.*, ss.label from study_event se, study_subject ss where se.study_event_definition_id=? and se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id

query.name: getCountofEventsBasedOnEventStatus
query.sql: select count (*) from (select distinct se.* from study_event se, study_subject ss, study s where se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ss.study_id = s.study_id AND ( s.study_id = ? or s.parent_study_id = ? )AND subject_event_status_id = ?) as ss

query.name: getCountofEvents
query.sql: select count (*) from (select distinct se.* from study_event se, study_subject ss, study s where se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND ss.study_id = s.study_id AND ( s.study_id = ? or s.parent_study_id = ? )) as ss

query.name: findAllWithSubjectLabelByStudySubjectAndDefinition
query.sql: SELECT se.*, ss.label FROM study_event se, study_subject ss, study_event_definition sed WHERE se.study_subject_id=? and sed.study_event_definition_id=? and se.study_event_definition_id= sed.study_event_definition_id and se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id ORDER BY sed.ordinal asc , se.sample_ordinal desc

query.name: findCRFsByStudyEvent
query.sql: SELECT C.CRF_ID, C.STATUS_ID, C.NAME, C.DESCRIPTION, V.CRF_VERSION_ID, V.NAME, V.REVISION_NOTES FROM CRF C, CRF_VERSION V, EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF EDC WHERE C.CRF_ID = V.CRF_ID AND EDC.CRF_ID = C.CRF_ID AND EDC.STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID =?

query.name: findCRFsByStudy
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT C.CRF_ID , C.NAME AS CRF_NAME , C.DESCRIPTION , V.CRF_VERSION_ID , V.NAME AS VER_NAME , V.REVISION_NOTES , SED.STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID , SED.NAME AS SED_NAME FROM CRF C , CRF_VERSION V , EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF EDC , STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION SED WHERE C.CRF_ID = V.CRF_ID AND EDC.CRF_ID = C.CRF_ID AND EDC.STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID = SED.STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID AND SED.STATUS_ID = 1 AND SED.STUDY_ID = ? ORDER BY C.CRF_ID, V.CRF_VERSION_ID

query.name: findAll
query.sql: SELECT * FROM STUDY_EVENT

query.name: findAllByDefinitionAndSubject
query.sql: SELECT * FROM study_event WHERE study_event_definition_id=? AND study_subject_id=?

query.name: findAllByDefinitionAndSubjectOrderByOrdinal
query.sql: SELECT * FROM study_event WHERE study_event_definition_id=? AND study_subject_id=? order by sample_ordinal asc

query.name: findAllByStudy
query.sql: select * from study_event se where se.study_event_definition_id in (select study_event_definition_id from study_event_definition where study_id = ?)

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO STUDY_EVENT (STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID,STUDY_SUBJECT_ID,LOCATION,SAMPLE_ORDINAL, DATE_START,DATE_END,OWNER_ID,STATUS_ID,DATE_CREATED,subject_event_status_id, start_time_flag, end_time_flag) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,now(),?,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE study_event SET STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID=?,STUDY_SUBJECT_ID=?,LOCATION=?, SAMPLE_ORDINAL=?, DATE_START=?,DATE_END=?,STATUS_ID=?,DATE_UPDATED=now(), UPDATE_ID=? , subject_event_status_id=?, start_time_flag=?, end_time_flag=? WHERE STUDY_EVENT_ID=?

query.name: getCurrentPrimaryKey
query.sql: SELECT currval('study_event_study_event_id_seq') AS key

query.name: findAllByStudyAndStudySubjectId
query.sql: SELECT E.* FROM study_subject S, study_event E, study st WHERE S.study_subject_id = E.study_subject_id AND S.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id = ? or st.parent_study_id=?) AND S.study_subject_id=?

query.name: findAllByStudyAndEventDefinitionId
query.sql: SELECT E.* FROM study_event_definition S, study_event E, study st WHERE S.study_event_definition_id = E.study_event_definition_id AND S.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id = ? or st.parent_study_id=?) AND S.study_event_definition_id = ?

query.name: findByPKAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT E.* FROM study_subject S, study_event E, study st WHERE S.study_subject_id = E.study_subject_id AND E.study_event_id=? AND S.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id = ? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: getDefinitionIdFromStudyEventId
query.sql: SELECT study_event_definition_id FROM study_event WHERE study_event_id = ?

query.name: findAllBySubjectAndStudy
query.sql: select se.* from study_event se, study_subject ss, study st where se.study_subject_id=? and se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id and ss.study_id=st.study_id and (st.study_id = ? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findAllBySubjectId
query.sql: select se.* from study_event se, study_subject ss where se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id and ss.subject_id=?

query.name: findAllBySubjectIdOrdered
query.sql: SELECT se.* FROM study_event se, study_event_definition sed WHERE se.study_event_definition_id = sed.study_event_definition_id AND se.study_subject_id=? ORDER BY date(se.date_start) ASC, sed.ordinal ASC, se.sample_ordinal ASC

query.name: findAllByStudySubject
query.sql: SELECT se.* FROM study_event se, study_event_definition sed WHERE se.study_subject_id=? and se.study_event_definition_id= sed.study_event_definition_id ORDER BY sed.ordinal asc , se.sample_ordinal asc

query.name: findAllByStudySubjectAndDefinition
query.sql: SELECT se.* FROM study_event se, study_event_definition sed WHERE se.study_subject_id=? and sed.study_event_definition_id=? and se.study_event_definition_id= sed.study_event_definition_id ORDER BY sed.ordinal asc , se.sample_ordinal desc

query.name: getMaxSampleOrdinal
query.sql: SELECT max(sample_ordinal) AS max_ord FROM study_event WHERE study_event_definition_id=? AND study_subject_id=?

query.name: findByStudySubjectIdAndDefinitionIdAndOrdinal
query.sql: SELECT * FROM study_event WHERE study_subject_id=? and study_event_definition_id=? and sample_ordinal=?

query.name: findAllByStudyEventDefinitionAndCrfOids
query.sql: select study_event.* from study_event left outer join study_event_definition on study_event.study_event_definition_id= study_event_definition.study_event_definition_id right outer join event_crf on event_crf.study_event_id= study_event.study_event_id where study_event_definition.oc_oid = ? AND event_crf.crf_version_id in ( select crf_version.crf_version_id from crf_version left outer join crf on crf.crf_id=crf_version.crf_id where crf_version.oc_oid=? or crf.oc_oid=?)

query.name: findAllByStudyEventDefinitionAndCrfOidsAndOrdinal
query.sql: select study_event.* from study_event left outer join study_event_definition on study_event.study_event_definition_id= study_event_definition.study_event_definition_id right outer join event_crf on event_crf.study_event_id= study_event.study_event_id where study_event_definition.oc_oid = ? AND study_event.study_subject_id=? AND sample_ordinal =? AND event_crf.crf_version_id in ( select crf_version.crf_version_id from crf_version left outer join crf on crf.crf_id=crf_version.crf_id where crf_version.oc_oid=? or crf.oc_oid=?)

query.name: countNotRemovedEvents
query.sql: select count(study_event_id) FROM STUDY_EVENT WHERE STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID = ? and (status_id != 5 and status_id != 7)

query.name: getStudySubjectCRFDataDetails
query.sql: select ecrf.event_crf_id, edcrf.event_definition_crf_id, se.study_event_id from study_event_definition sed, event_definition_crf edcrf, study_event se, event_crf ecrf, crf c, crf_version cv where sed.study_id = ? and c.crf_id = cv.crf_id and edcrf.crf_id = c.crf_id and ecrf.study_event_id = se.study_event_id and ecrf.crf_version_id = cv.crf_version_id and se.study_event_definition_id = sed.study_event_definition_id and se.sample_ordinal = ? and edcrf.study_event_definition_id = sed.study_event_definition_id and cv.oc_oid = ? and se.study_subject_id = ? and sed.study_event_definition_id = ?

query.name: getNextScheduledEvent
query.sql:
SELECT se2.* FROM study_event se2 JOIN ( SELECT se.*,sed.ordinal FROM study_event se JOIN study_subject ss ON se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id JOIN study_event_definition sed on se.study_event_definition_id = sed.study_event_definition_id JOIN event_definition_crf edc on sed.study_event_definition_id = edc.study_event_definition_id WHERE ss.oc_oid = ? AND se.status_id = 1 AND se.subject_event_status_id = 1 AND edc.participant_form = TRUE
UNION
SELECT se.*, sed.ordinal FROM study_event se JOIN study_subject ss ON se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id JOIN study_event_definition sed ON se.study_event_definition_id = sed.study_event_definition_id JOIN event_definition_crf edc ON sed.study_event_definition_id = edc.study_event_definition_id JOIN crf_version cv ON cv.crf_version_id = edc.default_version_id LEFT JOIN event_crf ec on edc.default_version_id = ec.crf_version_id AND ec.study_event_id = se.study_event_id WHERE se.status_id = 1 AND se.subject_event_status_id = 3 AND ss.oc_oid = ? AND edc.participant_form = TRUE AND (ec.event_crf_id IS NULL OR ec.status_id = 1) ) filter ON se2.study_event_id = filter.study_event_id ORDER BY date(se2.date_start) ASC, filter.ordinal ASC, se2.sample_ordinal ASC LIMIT 1
